text: Hello everyone. Excited to be here
today. I'd like to first thank Epic
Games for this opportunity. It's a great
honor to introduce our latest project
here at Onure Fest. Let me introduce
Monger Star Dive. Mongill Star Dive is
the successor to Monster Taming, a game
we first launched back in 2013. Known as
Mongill in Korea, the game was a huge
success, surpassing 10 million downloads
just in Korea. With this new title, we
aim to expand the world of Mongill by
creating a vibrant viewing world filled
with countless characters and monsters.
To achieve this, we chose Unve engine 5,
which allowed us to capture even the
most subtle emotional experience of the
characters, making the world of style
dive truly come alive. This was the best
choice for delivering a seamless
crossplatform experience across PC,
console, and mobile. One of our key
goals is to provide players a whole new
gameplay experience by giving each and
every character dim narrative and each
own unique control system. That means
every time you change characters, it
will feel like you're playing a
different game. And this transforms Star
Dive from a simple action game into a
truly immersive adventure. Moreover, the
monsters in Star Diver are not just
enemies. They can be tamed, nurtured,
and become your companions along the
journey. Depending on their trait, they
can also be used to craft weapons or
used as ingredients to cook, adding a
deeper layer of strategy and connection
to the game. Each monster is living
growing creature, transforming the
conventional concept of monster
collecting into a meaningful dynamic
relationship. The Epic Game Store with
its global reach and strong community is
the ideal platform to connect with
players around the world. And we are
happy to announce that Mongill Star Dive
will be exclusively on the Epic Game
Store for PC. Now, I'm excited to show
you a brand new trailer from the game.
[Music]
